summary: Attempt to add items that grant Waterwalking like Oblivion had
descriptionHtml:
currently borked

if you equip an item that grants waterwalking, the effect still details waterbreathing (even though i changed it on the spell effect) and if you stand still you start to sink into the water - but you can jump back on to the surface

so right now it\'s a skipping stone instead of a constant effect (maybe this is why waterwalking isn\'t available in skyrim :P)

necklace in Riften Fishery next to the strongbox, or a ring in Calixo\'s Curiosities

i\'ve also added a few boots of muffling that were left out

the enchanted armor is there but i didn\'t add it to any leveled lists yet because i didn\'t want it to conflict with any other mod - so the only place to get the item is in the riften fishery - you can dischant it to enchant other items

waterwalking can be enchanted to rings, necklaces, foot clothing, and foot armor
author: Vaultdweller Exile
